DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety pharmacokinetic characteristic DP-R202 ( Sarpogrelate HCl 100mg , qd ) Anplag ( Sarpogrelate HCl 100mg , tid ) multiple oral administration healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic / Pharmacodynamic ( PK/PD ) Study Multiple Doses DP-R202 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The number patient thirthy-six.Patients randomly assign either anplag tablet ( Sarpogrelate HCL 100mg , tid ) 3days first , DP-R202 ( Sarpogrelate HCL 300mg , qd ) 3days Second DP-R202 ( Sarpogrelate HCL 300mg , qd ) 3days first , anplag tablet ( Sarpogrelate HCL 100mg , tid ) 3days second .
DOC.criteria: 20 55 year healthy volunteer Hypersensitivity Reaction Sarpogrelate HCL antiplatelets
